attributes.action: immediately repay £6577 claimed as cleaning expenses for his second home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It it understood that the P.M, Gordon Brown has claimed, and received payment, of £6577 for the expense of cleaning of his second home. This expenditure is not essential to his duties as an M.P. He could have put on his marigolds and done the cleaning himself like the rest of us and even as other MPs seem to have done. He should show leadership.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
